input.sentences: we had a party the other night .
my friend got a little crazy .
we walked over to the local diner .
once we got home i made us even more food .
output.sentences: Friends are drinking and having fun at a party.
One of the friends is wearing a paper hat on her head and acting very silly.
The group leaves the party and meets some more friends at the resturaunt.
They go on an after dinner walk together in the dark.
When they get home they decide to make dessert because they didn't buy any at the restaraunt.
